title: Team DieDie - Tryouts for OOL Team going for 2017 Split 2 OCS
body:
Greetings Oceania,

Team DieDie has opened applications for its 2017 OOL Team going into OCS. All roles (including coach/analyst) are open for application, to get started please comment your summoner names below or by adding 'TehLorde' through the LoL client. I would suggest you apply ASAP as the Oceanic Open Ladder will be up and running soon.

**Looking for:**

Top
Jungle
Middle
ADC
Support
Coach
Analyst

**Requirements:**

- Very dedicated player (preferably plat or higher)
- Commitment to the team 
- Must be from OCE (ideally living in Australia or New Zealand)
- Professional attitude and able to work with criticism from Analyst/Coach
- Proper Internet Connection and Hardware (mic/headset)

**In return, Team DieDie will provide:**

- Team bonus for making it into the Oceanic Challenger Series
- Professional & dedicated environment
- Managed frequent training and dedicated communication channels (Discord)
- Managed weekly analyst and coaching sessions
- A support staff that is committed to helping players reach their full potential
- Doing our best to achieve sponsorship for the team
- Legal framework to ensure a committed team (for OCS)
- Scheduled training to maximize team performance

**Please be prepared to answer the following questions when we are in contact.**

Full Name
Summoner Name
Date of Birth
Fluent in English (Y/N)
Computer Hardware (mic/headset)
How is your Internet Connection and stability
Comfortable to use mic (Y/N)
Comfortable to be filmed (at events like OCS) and streamed live (Y/N)
Days and times you are available to play and train
Any times in which you are 100% unable to play
Please list any work or educational commitments
What role are you applying for

I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Regards, TehLorde.
